title: Poornatha's Unified Portal
description: This project involves the development of an Admin Portal aimed at streamlining administrative tasks for Poornatha. The portal is designed to enhance efficiency by providing a user-friendly interface to manage various entities such as sessions, facilitators, colleges, and course types.

title: Activities Portal
description: This project is an Interactive Activities Portal designed to create an engaging learning environment for kids through drag-and-drop games. The portal also features a Presenter Page where educators or presenters can design and customize activities based on specific learning objectives, making it highly adaptable to different age groups and subjects.
